GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by its id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a given article

exampleResponse.author: happy_cat
exampleResponse.body: This article really opened my eyes to a new perspective!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a new comment for a given article

exampleRequest.body: This article really opened my eyes to a new perspective!

comment.author: happy_cat
comment.body: This article really opened my eyes to a new perspective!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of the specified article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the given comment by comment_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
